channel.title: Whonix 9 Gateway: Starting AppArmor profiles - reported as failed at boot
channel.description:
I have noticed this on a Whonix 9 Gateway that was just imported into VirtualBox.
The problem seems to persist after apt-get update && apt-get dist-upgrade
Unfortunately the content of the screen seems to be overwritten, since I can only see the start of that message part, not the actual "failed" status in red that caught my eye during boot. If this content goes to some log file, please tell me which one (I'm a Debian noob) so I could have a look there and eventually try to extract it and attach here if it's needed.

item.title: Whonix 9 Gateway: Starting AppArmor profiles - reported as failed at boot
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
[quote=“townsend, post:3, topic:526”]Hello.

I got three diffrent AppArmor Errors after first apt-get update && apt-get dist-upgrade.

pid1777
pid1612
pid1648

Normal or something to do to fix it?

Best Regards!

townsend[/quote]

It’s a different issue.

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Download#Connection_Issues_-_Tor_stops_working_after_an_Upgrade_and_needs_a_Workaround
  • https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,559.0.html

Please use the other thread.

Read full topic
